column5: There is a pic of a big pike floating around here every month or so.My buddy showed up at work yesterday withe the pic and said it was caught on rainy lake i knew it was not so i told him i would try to find it.Does anybody remember the web site it came off of.They are the pics if the pike eating another pike and the guy sitting in the boat with a monster one.Thanx
I think you are looking for Esoxhunter.com In there message boards they have some giant euro pike including the recent spanish pike and the one you are looking for.
holy smokes! those are some freakin monsters!!! wouldn't mind getting my hands on one of those babies!  my personal best is a 15.5 pounder... my grandfather kicks my butt with a 34lb giant
Those are some nice pike for sure.
